desc: Create Your Hype™ Static Motorsports is an automotive customs shop that specializes in high quality vinyl wraps and wide body installations. We are an industry leading installer of wide body kits, including: LibertyWalk, Mansory, Pandem by TRA KYOTO, Rocket Bunny, RallyBacker, STREETFIGHTER LA & more.

layout.text: Creating works of art for the street
